'''Silhouette and Silk Steps''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

It is featured in various [[stealth]] challenges (e.g. the Favonius Cathedral challenge in [[Venti's New Plan]]) and in the recurring event [[Windtrace]].
